definitions: a hinged flap at the back of a truck that can be lowered or removed when loading or unloading the vehicle.
shortDefinitions: hinged flap at back of truck

definitions: the door at the back of a station wagon.
shortDefinitions: door at back of estate or hatchback car

definitions: a social gathering at which an informal meal is served from the back of a parked vehicle, typically in the parking lot of a sports stadium

examples.text: they turned the parking lot into a huge tailgate party
who would have thought it would get him like this, returning after all these years for a tailgate before a football game?

shortDefinitions: of informal meal served from back of parked vehicle

definitions: denoting a style of jazz trombone playing characterized by improvisation in the manner of the early New Orleans musicians.
shortDefinitions: denoting style of jazz trombone playing characterized by improvisation in manner of early New Orleans musicians

examples.text: he started tailgating the car in front
drivers who will tailgate at 90 mph

definitions: gain unauthorized entry to a secured area by closely following someone with authority to enter

examples.text: a Toyota pickup tailgated the delivery vehicle into the prison
three boys tailgated a group of tourists into the theater

shortDefinitions: gain unauthorized entry to secured area by closely following someone with authority

definitions: host or attend a social gathering at which an informal meal is served from the back of a parked vehicle, typically in the parking lot of a sports stadium

examples.text: Lot 16E is reserved for alumni who wish to tailgate before the game

shortDefinitions: attend social gathering at which meal is served from back of parked vehicle
